title: New Champ Select Question
body: With the new champion select coming out soon, will OCE be getting draft mode back for it or do we only get to use it in ranked?

replies.body: Do you have any idea when it will come to OCE!?

One thing I'm worried about is premade/solo match making. I understand you have made the system match players so it can be fair, but a low population server like OCE is sure to get unfair 5 man premades vs 5 Solos or majority solo. This already happens to things like Normal Blind Pick and Twisted Treeline where 5 man premades are matched verse 2 duos and a solo player or a duo and 3 solo players. I have a feeling this is going to happen a lot, I'd rather wait in queue for an hour to get a fair balanced match making system even if that game lasts for 15 minutes than have short queues with a bad experience.
We are doing a lot of testing on NA and TR right now. We will have to see what the data looks like once its all been collected.
